ThingDef.label: Wooden Plates (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] A vest made of wooden plates strapped to the chest, back, legs, arms and shoulders. The cheapest and most basic of protection available. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Steel Plates Armour (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] A vest made of wooden plates strapped to the chest, back, legs, arms and shoulders. The cheapest and most basic of protection available, now enhanced with nanites. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Scaled Hauberk (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] A long coat which goes down to the knees. It is covered in scaled steel plates, larger plates and chains have been added throughout for added protection. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Brigandine (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] A long coat which goes down to the knees. It's interior is covered in steel plates, hidden by the outside layers, larger plates have been added throughout for extra protection. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Warbourne's Chain (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[MeleeDodge: +10%][Movespeed: -12%] A heavily used chain-mail vest with shoulder pads strapped on. Used by members of the Warbourne cult.

ThingDef.label: Encased Steel Armour (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] This heavy armour made of many metal plates and leather padded chain-mail. It provides good protection from all sorts of attacks, but at the cost of slowing the wearer down. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Royal Plated Armour (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] This heavy armour made of many metal plates and leather padded chain-mail. It provides good protection from all sorts of attacks, but at the cost of slowing the wearer down. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Royal Death Plate Armour (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] This heavy armour made of many metal plates and leather padded chain-mail. It provides good protection from all sorts of attacks, but at the cost of slowing the wearer down. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.label: Royal Plated Armour and Cape (Nan)
ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] This heavy armour made of many metal plates and leather padded chain-mail. It also contains a large furry cape to help keep the wearer warmer and help identify him on the field of battle. Also included is a small low-tech water cooling system to help keep the wearer from overheating. It provides good protection from all sorts of attacks, but at the cost of slowing the wearer down. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] This heavy armour made of many metal plates and leather padded chain-mail. It also contains a large furry cape to help keep the wearer warmer and help identify him on the field of battle. Also included is a small low-tech water cooling system to help keep the wearer from overheating. It provides good protection from all sorts of attacks, but at the cost of slowing the wearer down. This particular outfit has been enhanced by Self-Replicating Nanites, improving its overal abilities as well as the wearers comfort and mobility.

ThingDef.description: (Nanite)[Movespeed: -12%] This heavy armour made of many metal plates and leather padded chain-mail. It also contains a large furry cape to help keep the wearer warmer and help identify him on the field of battle. Also included is a small low-tech water cooling system to help keep the wearer from overheating. It provides good protection from all sorts of attacks, but at the cost of slowing the wearer down.
